snippet: The operation in Syria — still relatively limited — has become, in effect, a testing ground for an increasingly confrontational and defiant Russia under Mr. Putin.
abstract: Russia's military operations in Syria have revealed significant advances in its defense capabilities, raising alarms in West; campaign, Russia's first outside its own borders since dissolution of Soviet Union, points to rapid transformation of country's armed forces under Pres Vladimir V Putin and offers sign it is returning to status as major military power.

byline.original: By STEVEN LEE MYERS and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: The operation in Syria — still relatively limited — has become, in effect, a testing ground for an increasingly confrontational and defiant Russia under Mr. Putin.

headline.main: Russian Military Uses Syria as Proving Ground, and West Takes Notice
headline.print_headline: Russian Military Uses Syria as Proving Ground, and West Takes Notice

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
